articles.description: From ShopHQ to QVC, home shopping networks are struggling to adapt to the cord-cutting era
articles.content:
Welcome to 
The Brink. I’m 
Jonathan Randles, a reporter in New York, where I’ve been reporting on home shopping firms struggling to adapt to the digital era. We also have news on Japanese e-commer… [+378 chars]
